verbs.description: [V: Asked] [ARG1: to sum up President Trump ’s approach to foreign policy] , [ARG2: a senior White House official] on Monday boiled it down to three words : “ We ’re America , b --- h . ”
Asked to [V: sum] up [ARG1: President Trump ’s approach to foreign policy] , a senior White House official on Monday boiled it down to three words : “ We ’re America , b --- h . ”

[R-ARG0: Asked to sum up President Trump ’s approach to foreign policy] , [ARG0: a senior White House official] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: boiled] [ARG1: it] [ARGM-MNR: down to three words : “ We ’re America , b --- h] . ”
Asked to sum up President Trump ’s approach to foreign policy , a senior White House official on Monday boiled it down to three words : “ [ARG1: We] [V: ’re] [ARG2: America] , b --- h . ”
